New films and DVDs for April 2015

The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies

Peter Jackson directs the final instalment of The Hobbit trilogy. The J. R. R. Tolkien adaption continues with a star-studded cast including Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen and Benedict Cumberbatch.

Night at the museum 3: Secret of the tomb

Ben Stiller and the late, great Robin Williams return for the third part of the historical family-friendly adventure.

Annie

The classic musical from 1977 is brought up to date, starring Jamie Foxx and Cameron Diaz.

Exodus: Gods and kings

Biblical adaption of the book of Exodus, following Mosesâ€™ leading the Hebrews out of Egypt.

Dumb and dumber to

Comedy sequel with Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels.

Tinker Bell and the legend of the NeverBeast

Animated Disney movie. Tinker Bell and her friends must save the hunted NeverBeast.
